articles.french_summary: L'iPhone XS de 2018 ne recevra plus iOS 26. Apple le considère maintenant comme "vintage", ce qui affecte le support technique et les réparations pour les utilisateurs.
articles.english_summary: The 2018 iPhone XS will no longer receive iOS 26. Apple now considers it "vintage," affecting technical support and repairs for users.

d'iOS 26.explanation: Referring to a specific version of Apple's mobile operating system

l'iPhone XS.explanation: A specific model of Apple's smartphone, released in 2018

de 2018.explanation: Indicates the release year of the iPhone XS

vintage.explanation: Here, means old or classic, implying it's no longer current
vintage.cultural_note: Used similarly to English 'vintage' for older, valued items.

:.explanation: Colon, introduces an explanation or list

ses utilisateurs.explanation: Its users, the people who use it

?.explanation: Question mark, indicates an interrogative sentence
